modName: NFG KANJI WarPaints - RaceMenu Overlay Plugin
summary: A repacking of Nfghjk's kanji warpaint replacers into a RaceMenu overlay plugin. All credit belongs to the original author, Nfghjk.
descriptionHtml:
[size=6][u][b]Description[/b][/u][/size]

[size=4]This is a simple repackaging of Nfghjk's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57689/?]NFG KANJI WarPaints[/url] into a RaceMenu overlay plugin. The original files are warpaint replacers.

All credit for these belong to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/11547908]Nfghjk[/url]﻿. If you like them, [u][b][i]PLEASE[/i][/b] endorse the original file![/u][/size]


[u][b][size=6]Requirements[/size][/b][/u]

[size=4][url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]SKSE[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu[/url][/size]


[u][b][size=6]Changelog[/size][/b][/u]

[size=4][b][u]Version 1.1[/u][/b][/size]
[size=4]Original textures were 2000x2000, which caused bad stuttering when selecting them in RaceMenu. Textures are now the proper 2048x2048 and load correctly.[/size]


[size=6][u][b]Installation[/b][/u][/size]

[size=4]Extract to Data directory or install via NMM/MO.[/size]


[size=6][u][b]Included Kanji[/b][/u][/size]

[size=4]一二三四五六七八九十
闇威印雨影音夏火海楽
喝漢喜弓京空月好嫌拳
紅高魂最桜殺山燦斬侍
始終字疾狩暑女心森真
神吹水是生蒼赤泉禅創
創蒼男知地恥智蝶怒盗
灯道乳忍破曝罰妃緋飛
風淵碧望無鳴夜葉来雷
理竜力林涙冷恋和澪絆[/size]


[size=6][u][b]Credit[/b][/u][/size]

[size=4]As stated already, all credit belongs to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/11547908]Nfghjk[/url]﻿![/size]
author: Nfghjk
